Text:
Is this the recap before the last episode(s)? I'm a bit confused what to watch first, in order to see them all in the right order! Is episode 00 a recap, and then 17 and 18 the finale together? Or is 17 the recap and 18 the 2,5 hrs long finale? (in which case, what is this?) I can't look it up on lostpedia, I'm too afraid of spoilers :)
Thanks a lot, wow, this is really the end of an era.
Wow i cant beieve i've been watching this show for 5 yeears
This is to be watched before finale. It's to remind the whole story to viewers, and there are also actors talking about their characters and the show.
